```pddl
(:action obtain
  :parameters (?p - agent ?item - object ?place - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?place) (obtainable ?item ?place) (not (in_inventory ?p ?item)))
  :effect (and (in_inventory ?p ?item)))

(:action replace
  :parameters (?p - agent ?object - object ?target - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?target) (ready_to_replace ?target))
  :effect (and (not (ready_to_replace ?target))))

(:action pour
  :parameters (?p - agent ?target - object ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?target) (in_inventory ?p ?item) (not (clean ?target)))
  :effect (and (not (in_inventory ?p ?item)) (clean ?target)))

(:action clean
  :parameters (?p - agent ?target - object ?tool - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?target) (applied ?tool ?target) (in_inventory ?p ?tool))
  :effect (and (not (applied ?tool ?target)) (clean ?target)))

(:action dissolve
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?target - entity)
  :precondition (and (at ?actor ?target) (condition ?target))
  :effect (and (not (condition ?target))))
```
